description: This table contains history items of changes in dental treatments.

columns.name: TREATMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the treatment plan record

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TPL_MOD_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: Stores date and time for when the dental treatment was modified.

columns.name: TPL_MOD_USER_ID
columns.description: User who modifies data in a treatment record

columns.name: TR_LINKED_CSN
columns.description: Stores the patient encounter in which a particular piece of the treatment record was modified if it was available.

columns.name: TR_COMP_INST_HIST_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the revision history for the completed date and time of a treatment

columns.name: TR_STATUS_HX_C_NAME
columns.description:
stores the revision history of treatment status


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Planned


Completed


Canceled


Draft


Discontinued

columns.name: TR_START_DATE_HIST_DT
columns.description: stores the revision history for start date for a treatment

columns.name: TR_ORDER_NUM_HX
columns.description: stores revision history of sequence number of a treatment

columns.name: DENT_SER_HX_ID
columns.description: Stores the history of the provider that is considered the owner of the dental treatment

columns.name: TREAT_CHRON_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: This column records the date and time of a documentation change to the dental treatment.

columns.name: DENT_OPT_STAT_HX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The history of changes to the status of a treatment option within a dental treatment.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Selected


Unselected


Removed

columns.name: DENT_HB_ESTIMATE_YN
columns.description:
This flag indicates whether the an estimate was calculated for the dental treatment option at a given time.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: DENT_HB_GUARANTOR_ID
columns.description: The guarantor used when calculating estimates for the dental treatment option. This only applies to Hospital Billing (HB) estimates.

columns.name: DENT_HB_PRIMARY_CVG_ID
columns.description: The primary coverage used when calculating the dental treatment option's estimate. This only applies to Hospital Billing (HB) estimates.

columns.name: TR_APRV_DTTM_HX_DTTM
columns.description: The revision history for the date and time when the treatment was approved.

columns.name: TR_APRV_USER_HX_ID
columns.description: The revision history containing the unique ID for the user who approved the treatment.

columns.name: TR_APRV_STATUS_HX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The revision history of the approval status category ID for the treatment.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Unapproved


Submitted


Approved


Rescinded

columns.name: TR_RSCND_RSN_HX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The revision history for the rescind reason category ID for the treatment.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Approved in Error


Change in Patient Condition
